title: Junior .NET Backend Utvecklare
description:
Om företaget
  
Företaget är en välkänd aktör inom offentlig sektor med ett tydligt samhällsuppdrag. De arbetar aktivt med innovation och digitalisering och driver flera utvecklingsprojekt där teknik spelar en nyckelroll. Här erbjuds du möjlighet att arbeta i en strukturerad miljö med tydliga processer och moderna tekniker – samtidigt som du får bidra till samhällsnytta.
  
Om rollen
  
Vi söker en junior backend-utvecklare med stort driv att utvecklas i rollen. Du har nyligen avslutat din utbildning inom systemutveckling (eller motsvarande) och har arbetat med C# och .NET Core i utbildningsprojekt eller mindre praktikuppdrag. Här får du möjlighet att jobba i ett team med stöttning och handledning, samtidigt som du får ta egna initiativ och växa in i konsultrollen.
  
Teknikstack & verktyg
  
  

**Språk & ramverk:** C#, .NET Core Molntjänster: Microsoft Azure Databaser & ORM: Entity Framework Testning: Grundläggande erfarenhet av enhets- och integrationstester Verktyg & miljöer: Visual Studio, Git, Azure DevOps
  
  

**Vi söker dig som har:** Avslutad utbildning inom systemutveckling eller liknande
  
Grundläggande förståelse för objektorienterad programmering, datastrukturer och algoritmer
  
Nyfikenhet på och viss erfarenhet av molntjänster i Azure
  
Erfarenhet av versionshantering via Git och Azure DevOps
  
Intresse för testdriven utveckling och kodkvalitet
  
En förståelse för agila arbetssätt (t.ex. Scrum eller Kanban)
  
Flytande svenska & engelska
  
Personliga egenskaper Lärande och utvecklingsfokuserad
  
Bekväm med att arbeta i team, med stöd från mer erfarna kollegor
  
Har förmåga att utföra enklare uppgifter självständigt
  
Kommunikativ och ansvarstagande
  
Teknikintresserad med känsla för användarbehov och design Plats: Stockholm Start: Juli eller Augusti 2025 Längd: 6 månader med möjlighet till förlängning Omfattning: Heltid, konsultuppdrag

title: Subject Matter Expertise Developer
description:
Why we will love you
  
Simply because you have experience from working within design and engineering for the development and construction of buildings and facilities. You drive innovation and are stimulated by creative ideas and perspectives that add value. Leading others from a global perspective/leading a global topic and managing to reach out is something you like and have experience from, and having knowledge of, Project Management will be useful. Since you will be working in a global context with different clusters it is important that you love building relationships – both remotely and in real meetings. Ingka is constantly changing, and we always need to be ready to do changes in our ways of working or doing business. Therefore, you are someone who enjoys working with change management, have experience with it, and how to manage stakeholders.
  
  

**We are looking for someone who has:**  

Engineering education within Electrical design/installation or relevant work experience
  
Leadership/project management skills
  
Experience from working in a global organization
  
Have good knowledge of the general building process
  
Have an ambition to make energy sustainable
  
  

Last, but not least – you are a true ambassador for IKEA culture and values. You always keep the values at heart when making decisions and influencing others in a positive way.
  
Lead and coordinate general engineering work and specifically Energy Design globally within Engineering. Lead Solutions/Innovations for PPP within the competence area in Ingka to deliver safe, compliant, sustainable and innovative property solutions. Provide guidance, support, documentation, training, minimum requirements, best practices and alternatives to the global organization.
  
Communicate in English both spoken and written, in an adaptive way to get your message across in a clear and humble way.
  
Your responsibilities
  
Work within one or several key competence areas of Engineering, coordinate and document the work to develop, implement and maintain standards, guidelines, methods, tools, technical solutions, systems, sustainability best practice, and innovation to ensure delivery of safe, compliant, sustainable and innovative property solutions that meet the needs of the business and the many people.
  
Develop the engineering competence globally in Ingka in cooperation with relevant stakeholders and supporting functions in order to achieve the Real Estate scope.
  
Contribute actively to the development in how to engage with designers in order to continuously find cost-efficient and innovative design processes by optimizing the delivery of our partners and stakeholder’s competence and knowledge into the project design. Work and engage closely with Facility Management and Construction Project Delivery co-workers to optimize, innovate and develop the best project methods for design-construct interaction. Lead and guide the implementation in the Clusters.
  
Responsible for leading and coordinating within assigned key competence area, the delivery of training content learning solutions and tools with the general purpose of developing the overall construction competence in Ingka in cooperation with relevant stakeholders and supporting functions to identify learnings, thereby improving in-house knowledge, and the performance on subsequent projects.
  
Create an environment where the IKEA culture is a strong and living reality that embraces the diversity of co-workers and customers.
  
Within competence area lead the work and coordinate with internal stakeholders to ensure that specifications, standards, manuals etc. relating to Engineering and Lead Solutions/Innovations for PPP are consistent with other Ingka documentation, correctly reflects current business needs and are implemented in the cluster Real Estate organisations.
  
Support cluster organisation with questions related to Engineering in the projects generally and within the electrical topic specifically, in the context of each cluster organisation having direct responsibility for executing its business within the frameworks developed by Group Real Estate.
  
Within competence area lead and guide clusters in development of projects in both new establishments an in retrofits, and drive energy efficiency and sustainable energy in all of our projects.
  
Constantly explore innovations and follow external trend to update our way of becoming more sustainable, energy efficient, cost effective and simpler. Eager to learn more and try new solutions.
  
Work in the field of electricity spanning from low voltage to high voltage; from data network cabling to switchgears and transformers.
  
  

We offer you a multi-cultural environment where there will always be room for you to grow -both as a professional and as an individual. Ingka Group has a strong culture with values in center. We trust in our co-workers to make sound decisions and know we will get so much good in return because of that.
  
This role is located in Malmö.
  
About this work area
  
Group Real Estate - As engaged, open-minded, and curious experts in all parts of the real estate business we take responsibility for the real estate business at Ingka Group as a trustworthy, appreciated and wanted business partner. We secure new and maintain existing physical locations in order to meet the needs of the many people. We provide strategic insight based on our knowledge and understanding of the Ingka real estate portfolio. We take the lead in delivering safe, compliant, sustainable and innovative property solutions – with Democratic design and life cycle cost on top of our mind. We actively maintain and secure that our properties are kept in relevant shape for the business so that we can provide a safe and healthy environment for all co-workers and customers.

title: Full-stack Developer, Policy Edit and Multi Vehicle
description:
Are you a Full-Stack .NET developer who wants to create the smartest solutions for our users? We are looking for Full-stack .NET developers who want to be part of a Tribe responsible for developing and maintaining one of the company’s biggest core systems.
  
About the role
  
As a full-stack .NET Developer, you will be part of a distributed squad with colleagues from across the Nordics and the Baltics. With us, you’ll have the opportunity to actively contribute and influence decisions in your squad, delivering solutions that impact a very large number of users and customers. At Waypoint, you’ll also have the chance to work closely with technical and domain experts, developers, quality engineers, architects, and analysts — both within and outside your squad. There are great opportunities to continue growing as a full-stack developer or to explore paths into management or architecture.
  
About Waypoint and our squads
  
We have built our digital platform, Waypoint, from scratch—a unified solution for all services and business areas, utilizing modern technology. Waypoint is one of the Nordic region's largest .NET products. Every day, we focus on finding smarter solutions for our customers and ourselves. We are a team of over 150 people working in 12 cross-functional, independent squads to deliver a stable, scalable, and secure insurance platform. Waypoint is a complex and exciting system, continuously in need of skilled and committed individuals. This is where you come in.
  
As a squad member in Policy Edit, you’ll contribute to digital solutions that support insurance purchase and editing processes for Swedish private customers. The team focuses on enabling seamless digital flows through integrations for cases requiring additional steps like eHD or pre-payment, helping both customers and frontliners manage policies efficiently. The squad consists of developers, QA, and business roles located in Riga, Stockholm, and Oslo.
  
As a squad member in MultiVehicle you will take part of developing and maintaining a modern solution tailored for If’s commercial segment for automatically insuring the customers’ vehicles. The MultiVehicle squad consists of developers, architect and QA`s, located in Stockholm, Oslo and Riga.
  
Who are you?
  
We are looking for a driven full-stack developer with experience in both back-end and front-end development who wants to create fast and durable solutions that are user friendly. You see knowledge-sharing as a natural part of your work. You are also a team player with a natural appetite for learning new things and challenge yourself. Additionally, you are service minded and happy support both squad members and stakeholders.
  
  

**You also have:**  

Experience with .NET, C# and Message based solutions
  
Relevant education or IT experience
  
Experience with message-based systems, REST Api communication
  
Knowledge of Typescript, React, Redux and CSS
  
Experience working with services in Azure Portal – Functions, Web Apps, Service bus (nice to know), Storage (nice to know)
  
Good knowledge in Azure DevOps – Scrum, Git, Pipelines (nice to know), Biceps (nice to know)
  
Proficiency in English
  
  

We offer
  
In the same way that we place expectations on you as an employee, we also expect you to place high demands on us as an employer. Here are some of the benefits of working at If:
  
An including work environment where everyone is welcome.
  
Career and development opportunities in the biggest insurance company in the Nordics.
  
Social activities, as well as highly skilled professional environment.
  
Possibility of hybrid workplace.
  
Health promoting workplace with e.g., wellness allowance and various sports activities.
  
Great insurance benefits.
  
  

Additional facts about the recruitment process
  
**Application deadline:** 15th of June 2025.
  
**To apply for the position:** Please attach your CV and answer a couple of questions via our application portal. No personal letter needed.
  
**Work location:** Stockholm, Oslo
  
**Travelling:** Some travel in the Nordic/Baltic countries will be required
  
**Start:** By agreement
  
For more information, please contact Henric Lindqvist Sales Chapter Lead (henric.lindqvist@if.se, +46707965009 or Artis Jāne Policy Chapter Lead (artis.jane@if.lv, +37126554294).
  
Read more about our Tech Community at If and how we together create tech that matters: www.if.no/tech or www.if.se/tech.
  
Background checks will be done in accordance with the law in the country of employment.
  
We look forward to hearing from you!

title: Senior fullstack-utvecklare till Lokalguiden i centrala Göteborg
description:
Lokalguiden växer och vi söker nu vår nästa IT-stjärna.
  
Hos oss sitter du i centrala Göteborg tillsammans med fantastiska kollegor och nära till affärer, restauranger och kollektivtrafik.
  
Om tjänsten
  
Som utvecklare på Lokalguiden har du en viktig roll i verksamheten där du tar fram användarvänlig och kvalitativ kod för att, tillsammans med dina kollegor på IT och i övriga företaget, ta företaget till nästa nivå. I en innovativ arbetsmiljö kommer du under en dag exempelvis att:
  
* Arbeta med PHP (8+), Symfony, React, TypeScript, MySQL och AWS
* Vidareutveckla Lokalguidens marknadsplats
* Vara delaktig i Lokalguidens framtida utveckling


När du inte arbetar kan du spela pingis eller dart med dina kollegor eller bara slappa i en skön soffa. Är det vår eller sommar kan du njuta på takterrassen. Har du ärenden som behöver fixas tar det inte mer än några minuter, eftersom alla affärer finns i närheten, du behöver inte ens ta på dig ytterkläderna. På måndagar startar vi veckan med att äta en gemensam frukost.
  
Medarbetare på Lokalguiden erbjuds utöver flextid och en blandning av kontors- och distansarbete, ett generöst friskvårdsbidrag och ett grymt geografiskt läge. Självklart får du också möjligheten att välja din tekniska utrustning och dina arbetsverktyg.
  
Om dig
  
Tjänsten passar dig som har ett driv att utvecklas och som trivs med frihet under ansvar. Det är viktigt att du är proaktiv, initiativtagande och har en förmåga att se verksamhetens olika utmaningar och hur IT kan vara med och lösa dessa.
  
Att samarbeta med kollegor är en självklarhet för dig, samtidigt som du behöver vara trygg och bekväm med att självständigt arbeta i och utvecklas i vår IT-miljö och våra system.
  
Du behöver
  
* Ha god kunskap om PHP och/eller Typescript/react
* Ha god kunskap om MySQL
* Ha erfarenhet av att arbeta med molntjänster
* Tala och skriva svenska och engelska obehindrat


**Det är också meriterande, men inget krav, med erfarenhet av:**  

* Symfony, Laravel eller liknande ramverk
* Automatiserad testning, CI/CD
* AWS, Docker
* Google analytics, tag manager, utfallsmätning


Om Lokalguiden
  
I över 30 år har vi på Lokalguiden visat företag vägen till den perfekta lokalen.
  
Varje dag besöker tusentals användare vår marknadsplats, där det stora utbudet från fastighetsägare över hela landet gör att det alltid går att hitta en lokal som passar.
  
Lokalguiden finns för att göra sökandet efter rätt lokal, eller rätt hyresgäst, så enkelt som möjligt. Det har gjort oss till den självklara länken mellan fastighetsägare och lokalsökande bolag.
  
Ansök idag då urval sker löpande
  
Låter detta som en arbetsplats för dig? Ansök redan idag då urval sker löpande.
  
Anställningen startar så snart som möjligt eller enligt överenskommelse.

title: Azure Integration Developer
description:
**We're redefining what a data consultancy can be and achieve**


At Epical, we’re not just another consultancy firm; we’re on a mission to redefine what a data consultancy can be and achieve. Everything we do begins and ends with trust. For us, trust isn’t just a value—it’s the foundation of every successful partnership. As consultants, our role goes beyond providing advice and services. It’s about taking responsibility and seizing opportunities to help create a fairer world through expertise in integration, data and analytics, applications, and digital trust.

*If you’re a customer-focused Azure Integration Developer with a passion for building robust and secure integrations on Azure, we’d love to meet you!*

### **Your role as an Azure Integration Developer**


As an Azure Integration Developer at Epical, you’ll play an integral part in helping our customers solve their integration challenges. You’ll be responsible for:

* **Designing and developing Azure-based integration solutions**: Utilize Azure Logic Apps, Azure Functions, Azure API Management, and other Azure services to create robust, scalable, and secure integration solutions.
* **End-to-end delivery**: Take ownership of integration projects from requirements gathering to deployment and maintenance, ensuring high-quality solutions that meet customer needs.
* **Collaboration and technical support**: Work closely with team members, including Integration Architects, to ensure the seamless implementation of complex integration solutions.
* **Continuous learning**: Stay updated with the latest Azure technologies and best practices, contributing to the continuous improvement of our development processes.


Epical is on an exciting journey, delivering top-tier integration solutions on various cloud platforms. As we expand, we’re taking on more dynamic, large-scale projects that will offer you the opportunity to grow alongside us and develop your career within our integration community.

  


### **What you bring to the table**


To thrive at Epical, you should have:

  

* + **Experience with Azure integrations:** At least 3-5 years of experience with Azure Logic Apps, Azure Functions, Azure API Management, or similar Azure services.
	+ **A strong foundation in system integration:** Hands-on experience in designing and developing integration solutions.
	+ **Knowledge of Agile methodologies and DevOps:** Understanding of CI/CD and DevOps practices to ensure efficient and effective development.
	+ **Curiosity and drive for continuous learning:** A passion for keeping up with the latest technologies and best practices in Azure.
	+ **Bonus skills:** Experience with BizTalk or broader expertise in the Azure platform is a plus.

### **Why join Epical?**


At Epical, trust and collaboration are at the heart of everything we do. Here’s what you can expect as part of our team:

* **Work-life balance**: Flexible remote working options and an environment that prioritizes your well-being.
* **Stimulating assignments**: Work on exciting projects with large enterprise clients in complex integration environments.
* **Career growth opportunities**: Shape your role as you grow with us, learning from top-tier experts in the field of integration.
* **Comprehensive benefits**: Enjoy a competitive compensation package, training opportunities, and certifications to help you succeed.
* **A mission-driven organization**: Be part of a company dedicated to creating a fairer world by leveraging data and technology responsibly.

### **Practical details**


All roles at Epical are permanent, with the flexibility to work from home or any of our offices across Sweden (Stockholm, Gothenburg, Malmö, Västerås, Örebro, and Skövde). To qualify, you must reside in Sweden and have a valid work permit.

  

Please note that a security clearance in accordance with the Swedish Security Protection Act may be required for certain assignments.


If this sounds like the opportunity you’ve been looking for, we’d love to hear from you!

title: Senior Systemutvecklare
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.

 **Din profil (Skall krav)**  

* minst 5 års erfarenhet av JavaEE
* minst 3 års erfarenhet av Angular version 2 eller högre, med TypeScript
* minst 2 års erfarenhet av C programmering

  

**Meriterande**  

* Erfarenhet av JBOSS applikationsserver.
* Erfarenhet av agila utvecklingsmetoder.

  

**Sista ansökningdatum:** 09-06-2025  

  

**Om Deploja**  

Vi sysselsätter idag erfarna konsulter, inom bl.a. Systemutveckling, Test, Arkitektur, IT-Projektledning, IT-Säkerhet.  

  

Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?  

Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Välkommen till Deploja, där gräset faktiskt är grönare!

 **Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.


En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.


Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.


Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.


Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?


Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.

  

Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.


Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?

 *Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.*

title: Senior backendutvecklare - Java
description:
Vill du vara en del av ett företag där din tekniska expertis gör en verklig skillnad? Som senior Java-utvecklare får du möjligheten att vara med i utvecklingen av robusta och skalbara system som driver affärskritiska applikationer. Du kommer att arbeta med Java SE/EE, Spring Framework/Spring Boot, molnlösningar (AWS, GCP, Azure), API-design, microservices och containerbaserade arkitekturer (Docker, Kubernetes).


**Vad förväntar vi oss av dig?**

* Teknisk expertis: Ungefär 5 års erfarenhet av backendutveckling, molnbaserade system och erfarenhet av Infrastructure as Code.
* Kommunikationsförmåga: Du kan effektivt kommunicera komplexa tekniska lösningar till olika intressenter.
* Problemlösare: Du har en analytisk förmåga och kan tänka strategiskt för att hitta de bästa lösningarna.
* Ledarskap: Du är en informell ledare som inspirerar och stöttar dina kollegor.
* Teamspelare: Du trivs med att arbeta både självständigt och i team.
* Språk: Du är flytande i svenska och engelska, i både tal och skrift.

**Arbetsplats**  

Arbetsplatsen för den här rollen är Malmö med omnejd.


**Om Devoteam**  

Hos oss värderar vi medarbetarnas trivsel och utveckling högt. Vi har byggt en arbetskultur där människor känner sig inspirerade, utmanade och trygga. Vi tror att när du trivs och växer, så gör även våra lösningar det.


Vi är ett ledande IT-konsultföretag med en stark förankring i Malmös tech-community, både som Devoteam och f.d .Jayway. Vi är engagerade i att skapa långsiktiga relationer med både kunder och medarbetare. Vi drivs av en passion för teknik och innovation, och erbjuder skräddarsydda lösningar för företag inom en rad olika branscher. Bland våra initiativ kan nämnas Øredev , en av Skandinaviens största utvecklarkonferenser, som vi var med och grundade.


**Förmåner och praktisk information:**

* Kontinuerligt lärande: Vi stöder kontinuerligt lärande med kompetensgrupper varannan vecka, deltagande på Øredev och löpande kompetensdagar för din professionella utveckling. Du har möjlighet att ta certifikat med någon av våra partners (AWS, Azure, GCP).
* Ledighet och pension: Vi erbjuder 30 dagars semester, kompletterande föräldraledighetsersättning och tjänstepension enligt ITP1.
* Hälsa och välbefinnande: Självklara förmåner som friskvårdsbidrag, tillgång till företagshälsovård, hälsokontroller och lunchyoga på kontoret.
* Verktyg och utrustning: Du väljer själv de verktyg du behöver för att leverera och trivas i din arbetsmiljö.

**Ansökan**  

För att ansöka, vänligen skicka din ansökan via länken nedan. Vi uppmuntrar tidiga ansökningar eftersom vi granskar dem löpande.


För eventuella frågor, kontakta Sanna Ekelöf, vår rekryterare, på sanna.ekelof@devoteam.com. Sanna kommer att vara din primära kontaktperson under hela rekryteringsprocessen.
company_description: Devoteam is a leading consulting firm focused on digital strategy, tech platforms, cybersecurity and business transformation.

title: Fullstack utvecklare till Motus Logistikutveckling AB
description:
Är du redo att ta nästa steg i din karriär och göra verklig skillnad i en bransch som står inför en teknologisk revolution? Motus Logistikutveckling AB, ett samägt bolag med rötter i några av Sveriges främsta logistikföretag. Nu söker vi en talangfull Fullstack utvecklare med ett ben i Laravel och det andra i Vue.js som vill vara med och bygga morgondagens digitala logistiklösningar. Vi är inte bara en arbetsplats; vi är en innovativ hubb där din passion för teknik, din nyfikenhet, och dina idéer är nyckeln till att omdefiniera vad som är möjligt inom logistik. Framtiden börjar här – tillsammans med dig.

**Om rollen**

Som Fullstackutvecklare på Motus Logistikutveckling AB blir du en nyckelperson i utvecklingen av vårt nya Transport Management System (TMS). Vi är på en spännande resa där vi bygger framtidens logistiklösningar, och din roll kommer vara avgörande för att skapa en användarvänlig, skalbar och intelligent plattform. Du kommer att arbeta både med backend i Laravel och frontend i Vue.js för att skapa en sammansvetsad och modern lösning. Erfarenheter och kunskap inom AI ses som en merit.

**Teknikstack**

* Laravel
* PostgreSQL
* Redis
* Vue.js
* CSS
* Git
* Native UI
* Html
* JavaScript

 **Ansvar:**

  

* Utveckla och underhålla backend med Laravel samt front-end gränssnitt i Vue.js
* Design och implementering av JSON-APIer samt optimering av gränssnitt för maximalhastighet och användarupplevelse
* Samarbeta tätt med produktledning och utvecklingsteam för att integrera backend- och frontend-logik
* Implementera säkerhets- och dataskyddsprinciper samt automatiska tester
* Kontinuerligt integrera nya teknologier, inklusive AI-baserade funktioner för förbättradapplikationsintelligens och UX

**Kvalifikationer:**

* Erfarenhet av test driven utveckling (TDD)
* Flerårigerfarenhet av utveckling med Laravel och Vue.js
* Akademiskbakgrund inom datavetenskap/datateknik eller likvärdig erfarenhet
* Kunskap om MVC-designmönster och ORM-tekniker
* Erfarenhet av REST-API, AI-tillämpningar och UX-design är starkt meriterande
* Erfarenhet av domändriven design (DDD)
* Erfarenhet av separering av skriv- och läsoperationer (CQRS) i större systemutvecklingsprojekt

 **Erbjudande:**


Bli en del av ett ambitiöst team som skapar framtidens logistiklösningar. Vi erbjuder en dynamisk arbetsmiljö där dina idéer och ditt arbete direkt påverkar verksamheten och hjälper till att forma branschen. Vi är på en spännande resa mot en teknologisk revolution inom logistik, och du har möjligheten att vara med från början.

**Om Motus:**


Välkommen till Motus Logistikutveckling AB, där framtiden av logistik inte bara är en vision utan en verklig resa vi genomför tillsammans. Vi är det nya kraftcentret i logistikbranschen, skapat genom samarbetet mellan Närkefrakt i Örebro, Märsta Förenade i Stockholm och Alwex Logistik i Växjö. Tillsammans har dessa ledande aktörer kombinerat sin expertis och resurser i Motus Logistikutveckling AB – ett samägt bolag som drivs av innovation och ett mål att omdefiniera vad digital logistikteknologi kan åstadkomma. Du kan läsa mer om oss på vår hemsida www.motuslogistik.se.

**Gemenskap och Innovation**


På Motus tror vi på kraften i gemenskap. Du blir en del av ett engagerat team där varje medlem är viktig och där dina idéer och förslag hjälper till att forma vår gemensamma framtid. Tillsammans kommer vi att utforska outforskade områden av digital innovation, ständigt frågande, "Vad om?" och "Varför inte?"


Vi är inte bara en arbetsplats; vi är en lanseringsplatta för nästa generations logistiklösningar. Anslut dig till oss och var med när vi tar lösningarna till höjder som idag bara kan drömmas om. Framtiden börjar här, med oss, på Motus Logistikutveckling.

**Kontakt och information**

Vänligen observera att vi arbetar med löpande urval och tjänsten kan komma att tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdatum har gått ut. Vill du veta mer om hur det är att arbeta hos oss? Kontakta vår VD, Mika Salo, på 073-810 63 66 eller mika.salo@narkefrakt.se. Framtiden väntar på dig!

title: Frontend-developer
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.
   

  

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*
**Job Description**
 Key responsibilities include building and optimizing scalable, accessible front-end applications, ensuring accessibility compliance, expanding the component library, and supporting the rollout.
   

  

**Your Profile (Must-have Requirements)**
* Vue.js (version 3, with Javascript and/or Typescript)
* Contentful
* Git (and working with pull requests)
* Jenkins
* REST/GraphQL
* Javascript (ES6)
* HTML5
* SCSS
* BEM (or similar CSS naming convention)
* Bootstrap
* Webpack,Vite, Node.js, NPM
* Responsive design
* Accessibility, SEO and semantic markup


**Qualifications**
* .Net
* AWS
* Elastic search


**Application deadline:** 
 10-06-2025
   

  

**About Us**
 We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.
   

  

 Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?
   

  

 We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.
   

  

 🌟 A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.
   

  

 🚗 Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.
   

  

 💼 Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.
   

  

 🌴 Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?
   

  

 🏥 Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.
   

  

 📚 Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.
   

  

 🕑 Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?
   

  

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Backend Software Engineer
description:
*Nordnet redefined the financial world as the first digital bank in Europe. Now we are about to do it again and the aim is to create the next generation of bank, in the cloud. We know that this requires great people, great teams, and great technology. Do you want to join us and build the new Nordnet?*
**In brief**
 At Nordnet we want to democratize savings and investments by giving our customers access to the best tools and information whether you are a professional investor or a small saver. With modern technologies and speed of delivery, we are building the next generation investment platform.
   

  

**This is part of the role**
 Nordnet is a company with tech as the primary focus. In our agile and autonomous teams, you will be working with engaged colleagues that love to share their knowledge. As a developer at Nordnet, you will have the possibility to make an impact and create value for our customers with continuous releases several times a day.
   

  

**This is you**
 To succeed in this role, we believe that you take great pride in your work, are curious and continuously want to learn and grow. Collaboration and discussing ideas and concepts with your colleagues are things you enjoy and believe are important in order to build great products.
   

  

**As a Backend Software Engineer, You**
* Have experience of modern Java and Spring Boot
* Have experience of cloud development
* Have an interest in infrastructure as code and preferably experience in DevOps
* Design, develop, deploy and run Java services following good design and development practices
* Find the customer's importance and appreciate working closely together within a pure backend team, with stakeholders across the organization as well as outside 3rd-party vendors.
* Are a true team player that likes to share knowledge with your colleagues
* Love to automate, especially when it comes to testing
* Experience in high-performing, low-latency systems are preferred


 In this particular role, we believe you have an interest in savings and investments, and if you have worked in similar areas, it is even better.
   

  

**Nordnetters**
* Are proud of the friendly and humble environment
* Believe that the best code is written together and therefore appreciate pair/mob programming
* Continuously improve to ensure quality, making the code better with every release
* Commit to goals as a team, sharing the responsibility, success and failure


**What We Offer**
* Backend agile team which owns and maintains their product
* Your expertise and contribution will be appreciated from day one
* Plenty of opportunities to grow as an engineer
* Competitive salary and compensation


 We offer you the opportunity to work in a Nordic environment with a strong focus on delivery, product development and technology. Our ambitions are high and you will embark on a fast and challenging journey together with a skillful team of sharp and committed colleagues. Our teams are autonomous and embrace the agile way of working.
   

  

 Culture is built and cared for, each day by everyone. We’re proud of ours. Having a flat organization where anyone can talk to anyone creates a warm and friendly atmosphere worth protecting. We believe in a culture where every effort counts and where everyone is being recognized. A culture embracing our core values – passion, simplicity and transparency on all levels, no matter who you are or what you do.
   

  

 We are over 900 employees in Stockholm, Oslo, Helsinki and Copenhagen.
   

  

 Visit us on: www.nordnetab.com and https://career.nordnetab.com/pages/engineering
   

  

**Questions & applications**
 Apply today – we will start interviewing immediately. Please note that we do only accept applications through our recruitment system, hence no email applications will be considered.
   

  

 We want to inform you that Nordnet conducts mandatory credit and background checks, as well as drug testing as a part of our recruitment process.
   

  

 We look forward to receiving your application!

title: Full Stack Engineer
description:
**About Asendia AI** 




 Asendia AI is building the future of job search and hiring through AI. We work with fast-growing startups and prominent tech companies!
 



  





 🚀
 **This position is for one of Asendia AI’s trusted partners.** 




 We're helping them find a skilled
 **Fullstack Developer** 
 to support the build and growth of innovative web applications. You’ll work across the stack to deliver reliable, scalable, and user-friendly features used by thousands of users.
 



  





**What You’ll Do** 



* Design, develop, and maintain scalable full-stack applications
* Build and optimize front-end interfaces using frameworks like React or Vue
* Implement secure, high-performance backend logic using Java and Spring Boot
* Collaborate closely with product and design teams to deliver intuitive user experiences
* Integrate APIs, manage data flow, and ensure seamless front-to-back communication
* Participate in code reviews and technical discussions
* Troubleshoot and improve existing features across the stack



  





**Requirements** 



* Solid experience in both frontend and backend development
* Strong proficiency in Java and Spring Boot
* Hands-on experience with modern frontend frameworks (React, Vue, or Angular)
* Comfortable working with REST APIs and microservices architecture
* Familiarity with databases (SQL or NoSQL) and version control (Git)
* Strong attention to detail and problem-solving skills
* Excellent communication and teamwork



  





**Nice to Have** 



* Experience deploying apps on cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, or Azure)
* Knowledge of CI/CD pipelines and DevOps workflows
* Exposure to real-time systems or high-scale applications

title: Backend Developer (Node.js)
description:
Dedicated to powering entrepreneurs, Qred is a profitable, fast-growing fintech scale-up bank. In just 10 years, we’ve grown from a startup to hitting 1 billion SEK in annual revenue supporting over 50,000 entrepreneurs and helping create 10,000+ jobs every year. We combine smart tech with real-world experience to make funding simple, fast, and fair for entrepreneurs who need it most. With strong backing, a flat organization, and bold growth plans, we’re now looking for a Backend Developer to join us and shape the future of small business owners.
   

  

**About The Role**
 As a Backend Developer working primarily with Node.js, you’ll be part of our Core Business team, who is responsible for maintaining several core systems related to communications, funding and compliance. We have big plans for the future, where going live in new markets and attracting more customers is dependent on our operations running smoothly and flawlessly. As a backend developer in our Core Business team, you will play a key role in ensuring that our backend systems are fast, stable and scalable.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Teamwork and collaboration: Work closely with the team’s developers, Tech Lead and Product Manager to find the best solutions and ensure we meet our goals.
* Test your own code: Take responsibility for the quality of your work by creating and running tests to ensure stability and functionality.
* Drive innovation: With a DevOps mindset, improve our workflows and contribute to the optimization of operations and delivery.
* Promote security and performance: Ensure our systems are secure and perform at their best, even as our user base grows.


**Requirements**
* Experience: 2-5 years of experience in backend development with Node.js and familiarity with modern workflows such as DevOps and Continuous Delivery.
* Relevant backend skills: A strong understanding of RESTful APIs and micro-service architecture.
* Cloud expertise: Experience working with cloud platforms. We use AWS but it doesn’t specifically have to be AWS experience as long as you have relevant knowledge from other cloud environments.
* Testing skills: Being comfortable writing and executing tests for your own code.
* Communicative and team-oriented mindset: That you like working within a team, enjoy sharing knowledge and contribute to building a strong team spirit.
* Technical curiosity: That you enjoy staying up to date on new technologies and tools in backend development.
* Language skills: Being comfortable using English as your working language and understanding the importance of clear communication in an international environment.


**Other Great Experiences**
* Serverless: It’s great if you have experience in building and maintaining serverless applications. We do have a serverless setup here and even if it’s not a necessity to have worked with it before, it definitely helps.
* Infrastructure as code: It’d be awesome if you have worked with infrastructure as code before or you are curious about it.


**Why join us?**
 This is the place to be if you’re looking for a place to grow. Qred is growing fast, and our Qredsters along with it. With a non-bureaucratic organization and delegated responsibilities, we make sure there’s a short path from idea to action. In addition to our great culture, you get to work with the latest cutting-edge techniques offered by AWS, responsibility for the whole development chain, and last but not least a bunch of new competent colleagues to learn from!
   

  

**One last thing**
 This is a full-time, permanent position based in Stockholm. Don’t wait to send in your application, we are reviewing applications on a rolling basis. While the start date is flexible, the right candidate can join us immediately.
   

  

*Qred celebrates diversity and does not discriminate based on ethnicity, religion, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, disability status, or any other applicable characteristics protected by law.*
 Qred is an international FinTech scale-up that specializes in digital financing solutions for small businesses, with operations in the Nordics, Benelux, Germany and Brazil. We are passionate about helping small businesses thrive and grow, by providing them with business loans and credit cards. Right now we’re in an exciting phase of our journey that focuses on growth through smart product development and technology fueled by international expansion.

title: 3D Frontend Developer
description:

 Do you have what it takes to thrive in the vibrant world of IT consulting? VIPAS AB, a burgeoning company, proudly invites you to embark on your next engaging project as our**
**About VIPAS :**

As an IT consulting company, we don’t just offer services; we deliver tailored solutions using cutting-edge technologies like Java and Python.  We are looking for an experienced Senior Frontend Developer who possesses extensive knowledge in React, TypeScript, and native JavaScript. The ideal candidate will be proficient in using Docker containers to streamline development processes and have familiarity with CI/CD deployments and GitHub for efficient project management. Knowledge of 3D skills, or game development skills, along with knowledge of Three.js, will be considered a strong advantage. We would love to have a optimistic high drive developer to follow our very active 3D team.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities:**
* Design, develop, and maintain responsive and high-performance web applications using React and TypeScript.
* Utilize Docker to create, deploy, and manage containerized applications, ensuring consistency across various environments.
* Implement CI/CD pipelines for automated build, test, and deployment processes, improving development efficiency and product quality.
* Collaborate with DevOps teams to deploy and manage applications within OpenShift clusters, ensuring scalable and reliable infrastructure.
* Utilize Three.js for developing and integrating advanced 3D graphics into web applications (if applicable).
* Work closely with cross-functional teams, including pipeline developers, backend developers, 3D designers, and project managers, to deliver high-quality solutions on time.


**Requirements:**
* Extensive knowledge and hands-on experience with React, TypeScript, and native JavaScript (Node/Express)
* Familiarity with Docker containers, including creating, deploying, and managing containerized applications using Docker CLI and Docker Compose.
* Familiarity with CI/CD tools and processes, such as Jenkins, GitHub Actions, or similar platforms.
* Experience with GitHub for version control and collaboration.
* Familiarity with Azure stack, Azure functions, CosmosDB, Azure Busses, etc.


**Education and Experience:**
* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
* 4+ years of professional experience in frontend development.


**Required Skills**
* React
* Docker
* Azure Stack
* Docker Compose
* Jenkins
* Docker CLI
* Javascript
* Azure Functions
* EXPRESS
* Github
* Typescript
* Node
* CosmosDB
* CI/CD


**Preferred Skills**
* 3D graphics
* game development
* 3D Modelling
* Web Applications
* 3d Rendering


**Languages**
* English (Proficient)


**Why Join Us?**
 Vipas AB offers attractive employment packages for IT consultants, aligned with the Teknikföretagen (Almega) collective agreement. Clients Working with us provides opportunities in diverse industries, allowing you flexibility and growth. If you’re driven and eager to face new challenges, join the VIPAS family.
   

  

 You'll be part of an innovative team driving the future of telecom, Automotive, Retail, and Banking. If you're ready to take on challenging projects and grow your career in a cutting-edge environment, this is the opportunity for you!
   

  

 Apply Now & Please feel free to reach me at shrini@vipas.se
   

  

 Note: Please do apply if you have Sweden PR/ citizenship OR a Sweden work permit.
   

  

**How to Apply:**
 Interested candidates are encouraged to apply by submitting their resume and cover letter. Join us in driving innovation in the VIPAS AB!
   

  

 Please note! We offer continuously. That means that we sometimes remove the assignments before the deadline. If you are interested we recommend that you apply immediately.

title: C# Developer
description:
**👨‍💻** 
**C# Developer**
 🚀 About MSAB
   

  

 We believe that you are dreaming of using your technical skills and your innovative mindset to create a better democratic world. Especially by solving crimes, gathering intelligence, investigating fraud and fighting corruption. At MSAB we make that dream come true!
   

  

 MSAB is one of the world’s leading digital forensic companies. We develop digital forensic solutions for mobile device examination and analysis used globally. Working with programming you will perform demanding tasks that tickles your innovative mindset and challenge your technical skills to find your way forward towards a solution.
   

  

**🛠️** 
**Your Role**
 As a C# Developer, you will:
   

  

* Develop and maintain desktop applications using C# .NET and WPF.
* Write unit and integration tests, utilizing Docker.
* Participate in daily Kanban meetings, backlog grooming, and retrospectives.
* Collaborate on architectural discussions and application development strategies.


**👥** 
**Meet the XEC Team**
**Join Our Dynamic XEC Team, Comprising**
* 4 Developers
* 1 Tester
* 1 UX Designer
* 1 Product Manager


**Together, We Develop And Maintain MSAB's Frontline Products, Including**
* XRY Kiosk and Tablet: User-friendly tools for mobile device data extraction.
* XEC Director: A centralized management solution for overseeing connected client systems.


**🎯** 
**What We're Looking For**
**Must-Haves**
* We don’t hire mediocre developers, we hire top talent who know they are very good and strive to unleash their full potential together with your amazing peers
* Strong understanding of Windows desktop application development.
* Minimum of 3 years' experience in C# development.
* Willingness to work with and modernize legacy code.
* Fluency in Swedish or excellent proficiency in English.
* University-level education in software development or equivalent experience.


**Nice-to-Haves**
* Experience with client-server communication (WCF or similar technologies).
* Knowledge of gRPC.
* Proficiency in SQL Server (T-SQL).
* Familiarity with the MVVM pattern in WPF.
* Understanding of cloud technologies and services.
* Experience with agile methodologies, particularly Kanban.


**Personal Attributes**
* Team player with a collaborative mindset.
* Open-minded and adaptable to various coding practices.
* We are nerds, and to like it here it’s always a + to have specific interests that may not be common to common people


**🌍** 
**What We Offer**
 Join a company that's making a real difference. At MSAB, you'll find a collaborative environment, opportunities for professional growth, and the chance to be part of a mission that matters. We are working in a hybrid office model so you can meet your peers as well as working from home.
   

  

 MSAB is a world leader in forensic technology for extracting and analyzing data from mobile devices. The MSAB vision is to empower every investigation with digital forensic solutions for a safer world.
   

  

 MSAB deliver high quality digital forensic solutions to extract, review, analyze and manage data and are a trusted partner to Law Enforcement, Defense Forces, Government Agencies and Forensic Laboratories in democratic countries throughout the world enabling them to investigate crime, gather intelligence, investigate fraud and fight corruption. Our values encompass being an ethics-driven company focused on innovation and results.

title: Backend Software Engineer
description:
**About Us**
**nShift** 
 is the leading global provider of cloud delivery management solutions (SaaS), we enable the frictionless shipment and return of almost one billion shipments across 190 countries each year. We are headquartered in London and Oslo and have over 460 employees across offices in Sweden, Finland, Norway, Denmark, the United Kingdom, Poland, the Netherlands, Belgium, and Romania.
   

  

 Our software is used by many of the world leading e-commerce, retail, manufacturing, and 3PL shippers due to us having over 1000 carriers integrated into our platform, nearly 3 times more than our competitors!
   

  

 If you buy goods online, there is a strong chance that nShift has powered that delivery, so come and join us as we shape the future of shipping, one frictionless journey at a time.
   

  

**About You**
 We are looking for a determined and career focused Backend Software Engineer to join our brilliant team. You will have experience in implementing, maintaining and testing coding, infrastructure and architecture. You will be a team player and also be able to work autonomously with the goal of producing high calibre outcomes.
   

  

**Purpose of Role**
 Engineering has a team structure based on current products. We have developers, architects, managers and QA engineers distributed over offices in Europe.
   

  

 You will work in a mixed team with 4-7 members where your colleagues can be located in the office and/or remotely. Working with us means an international career opportunity in a fast-growing company.
   

  

**The area of responsibility includes:**
* Build cutting-edge products that bring the joy to a better and more creative workplace.
* You’ll be responsible for the implementation, maintenance, testing, and deployment in accordance with the company guidelines concerning coding, architecture, and infrastructure.
* Be a valued member of an autonomous, cross-functional agile team. Facilitate collaboration with other engineers, product owners, and QA/Testers to solve problems as well as assist stakeholders in addressing technical aspects of requirements.
* Deliver qualitative, cost-efficient, and scalable solutions. This means that you strive to produce simple and reusable code.
* Keep up with new technologies and proactively suggest improvements for future development.
* Ensure a consensus around requirements among the project members and that the products are built accordingly to our definition of done.


**Requirements:**
* BS degree in Computer Science or related field
* Fluent in English (both written and spoken)
* Minimum 3-5 years of experience
* Service-minded and positive attitude
* High working capacity and the ability to work independently
* As a person you are structured and thorough.
* You are a team player with good communication skills.
* You have a positive and solution-oriented approach to problems and challenges
* Very good knowledge of object-oriented development and modelling.
* Experience from working with common frameworks applicable to the platform, for example, Spring, JPA/Hibernate, Swagger, Maven etc.
* Knowledge of REST API’s
* Interest in front-end development JS, TypeScript.
* Knowledge software architecture, microservices, Docker, or CI/CD, VueJS is a great plus


**Please ensure you upload your CV in English**
 At nShift we believe in embracing diversity in all forms and fostering an inclusive environment for everyone which we believe is essential for our continued success. We're an equal-opportunity employer which means that all applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to ethnicity, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity, family or parental status, national origin, veteran, neurodiversity, or disability status.

title: Fullstack Developer to MittVaccin
description:
*Cambio is one of the Nordics' leading suppliers in eHealth with a comprehensive offering for the entire health and care chain. Our eHealth solutions support healthcare professionals in their daily work and offer patients safer and more easily accessible care. We are proud to be an important part of Swedish health and social care. We are growing continuously and now have about 1100 employees in several countries.*
*Since 2012, MittVaccin has been a pioneer in digital service development for residents and healthcare providers within both the private and public healthcare sectors. Since 2020, we are Cambio MittVaccin, and as a member of Cambio, our innovation and digitalization of vaccination services have accelerated. With the trust of 13 regions and 350 healthcare providers with clinics in over 220 municipalities in Sweden's all 21 regions, we have a nationwide presence, continuously striving to improve the interaction between vaccinators and residents. MittVaccin is the singlest largest source of vaccination information in Sweden supporting not only its many healthcare providers but also national reporting and information sharing. Our work increases awareness, knowledge, and accessibility to vaccinations. In this way, we aim to drive demand for patient-safe and efficient vaccination management in Sweden, ultimately benefiting both public health and society’s protection against serious diseases* 
*.*
**The position**
 As a Fullstack Developer with us, you will have the opportunity to work on and develop Sweden's most modern and well-established digital vaccination platform – MittVaccin; both the EHR system and the Inhabitant service mittvaccin.se and related solution components. You will be part of a dynamic and agile organization with global ambitions. Every team member is an essential link in the chain, and each person has significant individual responsibility and the opportunity to shape their role. You will see firsthand how your development work contributes to public benefit and preventive healthcare for all.
   

  

 In this role, you will work on the development, design, and architecture of both our frontend and backend, with a primary focus on backend. You will also be involved in technical investigations as part of your work. Together with the development team—comprising system developers, solution architects, product owners, and others—you will drive the development of MittVaccin Journal and MittVaccin Citizen Service forward.
   

  

 The focus is on new development and building from scratch rather than pure maintenance. Key requirements for the services include scalability, performance, regulatory compliance, medical safety, and self-service functionality. The development team works agilely using Kanban and Scrum in sprints, with multiple service releases each year. You will participate in sprint planning alongside product owners and the rest of the development team.
   

  

 Our workplace is characterized by modern and coaching leadership, respect, inclusion, transparency, personal ownership, flexibility, continuous improvement, and a strong commitment to caring for each other as colleagues and human beings.
   

  

 At Cambio, we encourage taking initiatives that contribute to the development of the company and ourselves. For us, it is important that you should have the opportunity to grow, both as a person and as an employee. Our culture is described through the words “Trust”, “Care” and “Together” which permeate everything we do.
   

  

**About You**
 You are passionate about finding the best solutions for our customers, have a pedagogical approach, and find it interesting to deepen your understanding of various healthcare processes and needs—translating them into technical solutions. You work independently with strong self-motivation but also thrive when collaborating with your team members or customers.
   

  

**Requirements** 
  

  

* 5+ years of experience as a full-stack developer
* Strong proficiency in SQL (including stored programs, views, and performance optimization)
* Extensive knowledge of PHP and PHPUnit, including object-oriented frameworks
* Experience with JavaScript and React or similar libraries
* Knowledge of API design and development
* Experience in requirements gathering, architecture/design, and development infrastructure
* Solid experience working with agile methodologies, such as Scrum and Kanban
* Experience working with IT/development in swedish healthcare, providing an understanding of relevant laws and regulations affecting system design
* Ability to communicate fluently in Swedish, as it is required for daily communication.


**It's a bonus if you have**
* Experience with some of the following: MySQL, Apache, Redis, Docker or Git
* Experience with clustered environments and load balancing for web applications
* Experience with API technologies such as SOAP and REST
* Experience using standards and reference models for healthcare informatics and interoperability, such as FHIR, OpenEHR, Snomed-CT, ICD, KVÅ, and related regulatory frameworks for information management
* Experience working with IT/development in healthcare, giving you an understanding of the laws and regulations that impact system design


**Place of employment** 
 : Stockholm
   

  

 At Cambio we value a healthy work-life balance, and to encourage that we apply a hybrid working-model. Together with your team you decide which days you work at the office. On the remaining days you can work remotely from home, but you are always more than welcome to work at the office too.
   

  

**Scope** 
 : Full time
   

  

**Form of employment:** 
 Permanent employment, 6 months trial period
   

  

**Other:** 
 We screen the applications and hold interviews continuously so please send your application as soon as possible via the link.
   

  

 We encourage and eagerly welcome all applications, but we will only consider candidates who are located and have the legal right to work in
 **Sweden.** 
 We will ask for verification during the process.
   

  

**We look forward to receiving your application!**
 Read more about us
 **here!**
 Are you interested in Cambio but you don’t feel that this position is the perfect match? Check out our other open positions at the career site
 **here!**
 Cambio Healthcare Systems is Sweden’s leading suppliers of healthcare information systems and a growing player in the European market with just over 100,000 users across general and university hospitals, specialist units and outpatient units. Through the use of our integrated solutions, our customers provide services to 4 million patients.

title: Senior fullstack developer
description:
**About us** 




 Join us at Gemmai, where we're revolutionizing the traditional pawnshop industry with cutting-edge AI technology and on-demand valuations. As a fintech pioneer, we blend the best of both worlds: the reliability of pawnshops and the innovation of technology. Backed by top investors in Sweden, we are a fast-moving, ambitious company driven by tech-first principles. We're not just a pawnshop; we're a tech company reshaping an entire industry.
 



  





**About the role** 




 This role is more than a job; it's a mission. As a Senior Full-Stack Engineer at Gemmai, you'll be at the forefront of transforming the pawnshop and valuation industry. Your role is critical: you'll architect high-quality software, influence our product direction, and shape our technological future. This is a unique opportunity to leave your mark in an environment that values creativity, innovation, and expertise.
 



  





**Work tasks** 



* Develop robust tools and applications using clean, efficient code.
* Automate tasks to streamline processes.
* Conduct validations and verification testing.
* Collaborate cross-functionally to enhance and troubleshoot our products.



  





**We are Looking For** 




 We are seeking someone interested in continual development as a developer and who consistently stays updated with technological advancements. We believe you are a problem solver, take initiative, and are committed to code quality.
 



  




* A Master’s or Bachelor’s degree in Engineering, preferably in Computer Science or a similar field.
* Proven experience in Full-Stack development, particularly with Node.js/TypeScript and React.
* Strong understanding of REST APIs and GraphQL.
* Professional level of English, both written and spoken. English is the primary language in our company.



  





**It is Meritorious if You Have** 



* Familiarity with Material-UI, Phyton, PostgreSQL
* Experience in Docker deployment.



  





**Work tasks** 



* Ownership & Impact: Your voice matters in our close-knit team.
* Flexible Remote Work: Join us from anywhere in Sweden, with office spaces in Stockholm, Gotland, Blekinge, Malmö, or from your home.
* Equity Package: Be more than an employee; be a partner with our vesting program.
* The Swedish Model: Enjoy comprehensive benefits, including a pension plan, parental leave, 30 days of paid vacation, and health benefits.
* Social Gatherings: Regular meetups to connect and unwind.
* Tech Gear: Choose from Mac or Microsoft setups to craft outstanding products.
* We work with continuous selection in our hiring processes.



  





 Apply here at Linkedin or on our website https://www.gemmai.io/fullstack-developer

title: Experienced .NET Developer in SEB Life & Pension I Stockholm
description:
*Since SEB was founded in 1856, our focus on customers and long-term relationships has been at the heart of our success. We aim to drive positive change by providing capital to help everyone reach their goals and accelerate progress towards a sustainable tomorrow.*
 Life & Pension in SEB is one of the largest pensions and insurance provider in Sweden and we serve both corporate and private customers. Our offering consists of products and services for important life events and by this we create certainty in an uncertain future. As a subsidiary in a large financial service group, we are able to benefit from a small company’s advantages that give you as an employee the possibility to influence and at the same time get access to a large company’s possibilities to develop and grow. Our brilliant techies work hard to future proof SEB’s digital architecture and customer products because it genuinely makes a huge impact for our customers and colleagues. Does that sound like a fit for you?
   

  

**About The Role**
 As a .NET developer you will join a team of 5 developers in a modernization phase; we develop a new access layer towards our core insurance applications utilizing new technologies and modern ways of working. You will collaborate with several other teams within Life & Pension and play a key role in the ongoing core system transformation program.
   

  

 To thrive in this role, we believe you have
   

  

* Experience from working as .NET backend developer (.NET Core (v8 or later), C#, Kubernetes, GitHub Actions, MongoDB etc)
* Experience from Event driven architecture using Kafka/RabbitMQ, API design using GraphQL is highly meriting.
* Interest of delivery with focus on quality where unit tests are a natural and integrated part of way of working – positive mindset on TDD and BDD.
* University degree within Computer Science, IT or equivalent.
* Great communication skills and fluency in Swedish and English.


**People Would Describe You As**
* Someone who builds positive relationships.
* A team player who believes a team is stronger than an individual.
* An experienced developer with backend focus.
* A self-starter with a can-do attitude.


 What we offer
   

  

* Opportunities to help transform an industry into the future.
* Extensive training and learning opportunities.
* Collaborative and inclusive culture.
* Deliver world-class service to customers.


**Do you want to be part of SEB?**
 It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity is crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected, and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe or where they come from.
   

  

 Since we select candidates continuously, feel free to send in your application today, but no later than 22nd of June 2025. If you have questions about the position, please contact Jesper Borglund, jesper.borglund@seb.se or Talent Acquisition Partner Sebastian Vesterlund, sebastian.vesterlund@seb.se
   

  

 Please be aware that our final candidates undergo background checks, a process that includes for example identity control, verification of qualifications, credit checks, company engagements and criminal records checks. In some cases, we also apply random drug checks.
   

  

**Learn more about working at SEB** 
 on our Career website or through our Career podcasts.
   

  

 https://sebgroup.com/career
   

  

 https://bit.ly/SEBcareer

title: Senior Frontend Developer
description:
Job Responsibilities
   

  

* Lead the design and development of complex software systems, applications, and features.
* Collaborate with product managers, engineers, and other stakeholders to define project requirements and objectives.
* Write clean, efficient, and maintainable code using industry best practices.
* Conduct code reviews and provide mentorship to junior developers.
* Troubleshoot and resolve software defects and issues.
* Perform unit testing and ensure software quality and reliability.
* Stay updated on emerging technologies and industry trends.
* Participate in architectural discussions and contribute to system design.
* Meet project deadlines and deliver software solutions on schedule.


**Critical Skills & Experience Requirements**
* Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science or related field.
* Proven experience as a software developer, with a strong portfolio of successful projects.
* Proficiency in programming languages such as Java, C++, Python, or others relevant to the role.
* Experience with software development methodologies and tools (e.g., Agile, Git).
* Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.
* Excellent communication and teamwork abilities.
* Understanding of software architecture and design patterns.
* Ability to adapt to new technologies and learn quickly.
* Project management experience is advantageous.


**About Toptracer**
 Our mission is to help people enjoy the wonderful game of golf even more by developing tracing technology for TV and gamification to ranges. Our range technology is used globally and millions of people. We're focused on helping people worldwide improve their golf game which leads to healthy, active and social lifestyles. Our broadcast technology is aired worldwide and makes the tournaments really enjoyable for the TV viewers. ⛳️ 📺 🎥.
   

  

 All of our products are developed, tested and deployed inhouse at the R&D office. Join us at Toptracer Technologies and be part of a team dedicated to creating positive change through technology and innovation! 🚀 💻 💙
   

  

**More About Toptracer**

 We value fully engaged associates that come to work because they enjoy their work and the colleagues they have. We create a product that encourages people to be outside and get activated which enables a healthier lifestyle.  Our culture is driven by our mission to create moments that matter for everyone and our values for Caring, Courage, One Team, Fun and Excellence. If you want to learn more about them visit: Core Values | Topgolf.

title: Lead Java Developer
description:
**The Role:** 
 Team Lead Development
 



  





**The Team:** 
 A focused team of highly talented technologists, based in Stockholm, with strong skills across technology; development, UI, devops, testing, automation. The team is empowered and expected to make the technical decisions needed to deliver robust, great-looking products that meet customer needs, and they work closely with other parts of the organisation to achieve this. Everyone on the team is responsible for all parts of the system being built, run, and supported, making it an ideal place for a leader who wants to expand their own technical skillset as well as grow as a leader by coaching team members. The team values learning from and supporting each other in order to benefit from our different strengths and experiences. We are strong believers that collaboration is key to innovation and to produce a user experience and a technical solution that we can be proud of.
 



  





 The team is responsible for designing, building, running and supporting several products within the Trade Lifecycle division.
 



  





**The Impact:** 
 The team lead plays an important role in the success of the company, both directly through the achievements, learning and improvements of their own team, but also by driving change in tools and processes used in other parts of the technology organisation as well as by creating and facilitating cross-team collaborations. The lead will directly contribute to building the product, delivering code together with the Team.
 



  





**What’s In It For You:** 



* Be part of an empowered, self-organising engineering team with people who will help you grow
* Be part of an innovative and inclusive company culture
* Impact the team’s strategy for architectural styles, ways of working, deployment pipelines, data locality strategies, observability metrics, frontend frameworks, and much, much more
* Expand your technical skill set by working in a modern tech stack (including but not limited to Kubernetes, relational and NoSQL databases,Java, Golang, and Python)
* Help improve the environment and our society by contributing to our many social initiatives (optional)
* Grow as a leader through collaborations with other leaders
* Work on market-leading solutions with people across the globe



  





**Responsibilities:** 



* Foster a positive and collaborative team environment which embodies the company culture
* Take technical ownership of the products built, run, and supported by the team
* Provide guidance and mentorship to individuals and team to achieve their goals
* Create and ensure adherence to coding standards, guidelines, and best practices
* Manage tech partnerships with internal & external vendors
* Schedule and participate in the on call support



  





**What We’re Looking For:** 



* Strong java backend skills (architecting/designing/building)
* Strong ownership and responsibility traits
* Wide experience from working in software development teams
* Excellent communication skills
* Business mindedness and a solution-oriented mindset
* An aptitude and willingness to improve yourself and others
* Someone who will work from the office at least 3 days per week
* 7+ years of software development experience



  





**We’d Also Prefer It if You Have:** 



* A proven track record of managing a small team
* Experience in leading at least one technical project
* An interest in financial markets



  









  





**About OSTTRA** 




  





*Candidates should note that OSTTRA is an independent firm, jointly owned by S&P Global and CME Group. As part of the joint venture, S&P Global provides recruitment services to OSTTRA - however, successful candidates will be interviewed and directly employed by OSTTRA, joining our global team of more than 1,200 post trade experts.* 




  





 OSTTRA was formed in 2021 through the combination of four businesses that have been at the heart of post trade evolution and innovation for the last 20+ years: MarkitServ, Traiana, TriOptima and Reset. OSTTRA is a joint venture, owned 50/50 by S&P Global and CME Group.
 



 With an outstanding track record of developing and supporting critical market infrastructure, our combined network connects thousands of market participants to streamline end to end workflows - from trade capture at the point of execution, through portfolio optimization, to clearing and settlement.
 



 Joining the OSTTRA team is a unique opportunity to help build a bold new business with an outstanding heritage in financial technology, playing a central role in supporting global financial markets.
 



  





 Learn more at www.osttra.com.
 



  





**What’s In It For You?**




  





**Benefits:**




 We take care of you, so you can take care of business. We care about our people. That’s why we provide everything you—and your career—need to thrive at S&P Global.
 



  





 Our benefits include:
 


* Health & Wellness: Health care coverage designed for the mind and body.
* Flexible Downtime: Generous time off helps keep you energized for your time on.
* Continuous Learning: Access a wealth of resources to grow your career and learn valuable new skills.
* Invest in Your Future: Secure your financial future through competitive pay, retirement planning, a continuing education program with a company-matched student loan contribution, and financial wellness programs.
* Family Friendly Perks: It’s not just about you. S&P Global has perks for your partners and little ones, too, with some best-in class benefits for families.
* Beyond the Basics: From retail discounts to referral incentive awards—small perks can make a big difference.



 For more information on benefits by country visit: https://spgbenefits.com/benefit-summaries
 



  





 -----------------------------------------------------------
 



  





**Equal Opportunity Employer** 




 S&P Global is an equal opportunity employer and all qualified candidates will receive consideration for employment without regard to race/ethnicity, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, disability, marital status, military veteran status, unemployment status, or any other status protected by law. Only electronic job submissions will be considered for employment.

 Do you have what it takes to thrive in the vibrant world of IT consulting? VIPAS AB, a burgeoning company, proudly invites you to embark on your next engaging project as our**
